keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul pledges more police on the beat, a fair funding formula for Sussex police and stronger action on anti-social behaviour.
Paul will fight the local NHS cuts, ensure frontline services are protected to keep the Sussex County Hospital working.
Act now for Schools - Paul pledges more investment in schools and against the academies system.

issues.education: Act now for Schools - schools sand for students. Liberal Democrats have promised to spend an extra Â£2.5 billion on schools - paid for in part by scrapping the costly academy program.
issues.governance: Paul wants to change the way we do things at Westminster. That means championing a more proportional voting system, an elected House of Lords and real devolution of power to local communities.
issues.health: Paul will fight the local NHS cuts, ensure frontline services are protected to keep the Sussex County Hospital working

images.caption: Paul Elgood - a strong voice for Hove & Portslade

leaflet.additionalNotes: Broken Promises, Real action for you. Paul wants to hear from you.
